description: This file defines the AGUIApp class, which is a main application class for exposing an Agno Agent or Team in an AG-UI compatible format. It includes methods to retrieve synchronous and asynchronous routers for the application.

classes.name: AGUIApp
classes.description: Main class for the AG-UI app, used to expose an Agno Agent or Team in an AG-UI compatible format.

methods.name: get_router
methods.description: Returns the synchronous AG-UI router for the app, configured with the current agent and team.

methods.name: get_async_router
methods.description: Returns the asynchronous AG-UI router for the app, configured with the current agent and team.
